rows.label: tev079101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Feloran about the Skell discovered in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Feloran about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Feloran about the stolen Skell called "Vita."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Feloran about the stolen Skell called "Vita."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Feloran about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Feloran about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0001
rows.name: We still don't have proof that it's a Skell at all. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0002
rows.name:
In fact, it's quite possible that it was simply some sort
of idol they worshiped. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Of course, we don't know what it might be. *fsssh*
But in an organization as large as the Samaar
Federation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, it seems reasonable that there would be some
overwhelmingly powerful presence at its heart. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0005
rows.name:
But if it is something they worship, then even if its
outward appearance is of a god, it's a safe bet that
an unspeakable demon lies within. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0010
rows.name:
As our people are often targets of discrimination,
I was a little uneasy about coming to this city. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0011
rows.name:
But when I saw that there was a church in your city,
I realized that you were a cultured people unlike the
Ganglion. *fsssh* This was a relief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Even if we worship different gods, I know that evil will
never claim those who hold righteous beliefs. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Forgive me for not introducing myself sooner. *fsssh*
My name is Feloran, and I am a religious scholar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0014
rows.name:
I hope that here I might be allowed to continue my
research into Golbogga the Creator, our God. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0015
rows.name:
As my research progresses, I may offer investigative
work to the agents of BLADE. *fsssh* I hope that you
will be willing to hear me out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0020
rows.name:
The Skell stolen by Ganglion? They may indeed have
called it the "Vita." *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0021
rows.name:
But I am becoming more and more convinced that it is
regarded as something like a god to them. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0022
rows.name:
It is hard to conceive of any other reason they would
infiltrate an enemy base merely to retrieve it. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0023
rows.name:
I wonder what sort of power this god holds in the eyes
of the Ganglion? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0028
rows.name: The Skell stolen by the Ganglion... The "Vita," was it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0029
rows.name:
I saw in the BLADE database that it was used by the
Ganglion commander. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0030
rows.name:
A legend... The Great One's vessel... *fsssh*
Something vital that is missing... Hmmm.
As I suspected, there is a deeper meaning to this Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Lacking both the machine and its passenger,
I can investigate this matter no further. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG0032
rows.name:
But I suspect it may be the key to unlocking not just
the secret of humanity, but of everything. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG1001
rows.name:
Ah! It is the second coming of Golbogga!
I see you are busy with your usual desiring, digging,
and destroying. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG1002
rows.name:
Sadly, it appears this material you call miranium is
no substitute for the voltant that covers Bedun. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG1003
rows.name:
Please do try to find a better material. *fsssh*
One that, say, emits poison gases when mined and
creates toxic byproducts when used in manufacturing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG1004
rows.name:
And know that no matter how deeply it pollutes,
we stand at the ready to devoltanize it. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG2001
rows.name: I received word from Kiliran about Toluera. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG2002
rows.name:
He said he had run away in a deranged state,
likely due to his inability to acknowledge the truth of
Golbogga. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG2003
rows.name:
This can only mean that Kiliran has discovered proof of
Golbogga's existence and showed it to Toluera! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG2004
rows.name:
I had worried that you might have betrayed me as well,
but now I stand grateful for your fine work. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079101_MSG2005
rows.name:
Ah, if only I could have seen Golbogga take physical
form with my own eyes! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
